Articles.Content:
Hey there,

Just want to share a really great project with you guys! This is a huge Control Panel built out of a lot of buttons, switches, lights etc.

I need to build one of these to enhance my KSP experience...:

Greetings

Zimplizity

Aha, then you will be interested in this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66763-Custom-hardware-simpit-repository-For-people-who-take-KSP-a-little-too-far

Some really cool things coming from these guys, and I plan to try my own one at some point in the future, but my time is currently full!
